data: imap 25 #smtp server used in mail account. smtp-mail.outlook.com for outlook #pop server used in mail account. pop-mail.outlook.com for outlook #imap server used in mail account. imap-mail.outlook.com for outlook #email adress. firstname.name@epitech.eu for epitech mail adress. #password of the account folder #specify the folder in whitch we want to display the mails
